thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A TEXAN BACK IN ROME
thread.title_full: A TEXAN BACK IN ROME - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Hart H
title: A TEXAN BACK IN ROME
text:
Well; back at the iQ. For those of you who read my reviews you recall my post from approximately three months ago was less than flattering.
I want to apologies. Although the post was true, I focused on one small incident that was part of an otherwise flawless stay. I just completed my fourteenth stay at iQ spreading over many years. Each stay has been a delight. The staff, with only one small hiccup, have always been very tolerant of my Texan ways.
Stepping back and looking at the whole package, iQ is simply a great place to stay, in a great location and staffed with good people. For the price I don't think you can do much better in Rome.
Yes Somona, fourteen stays.
